dt-option.name: columns.sortable
dt-option.summary: Enable or disable sorting on this column
dt-option.description:
Using this parameter, you can remove the end user's ability to sort upon a column. This might be useful for generated content columns, for example if you have 'Edit' or 'Delete' buttons in the table.
Note that this option only effects the end user's ability to sort a column. Are are still able to sort a column using the `dt-init sorting` option or the `dt-api order()` method if required.
